title: This Week's Top Stories - Gender Reveal Blast, Top-Rated "Paddington 2" & Menthol Cigarette Ban
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Gender Reveal Blast, Top-Rated "Paddington 2" & Menthol Cigarette Ban
description:
A gender reveal party in New Hampshire leads to a huge explosion, "Paddington 2" becomes the highest-rated film on Rotten Tomatoes, and the FDA announces an effort to ban menthol cigarettes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
